title: AliErkic
author: AliErkic
content: As predicted earlier already, Ripple will inevitably fail. I'm surprised how bad Ripple has performed and even my bearish prediction from 2 years ago was too bullish: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1381669.msg55906628#msg55906628Even my MORE bearish prediction from 1 years ago was too bullish: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1381669.msg57953990#msg57953990So let's make a recap. Once again, I want to apology and make my next prediction even more bearish because right now it is very clear: Ripple has lost! When Ripple challenged Ethereum some years ago for second place and succeded for a short time, Ripple fanboys were very bullish but as I warned, it was only for a short time. Quickly, Ripple lost its position against Ethereum again and some time later it lost against Binance Coin and USDT. It also lost a position against USDC but won a position against Cardano, which is no surprise because Cardano development is very slow and Cardano a very outdated coin. But even winning a position against weak Cardano resulted in NO GAIN for Ripple because Ripple is a shitcoin. Ripple is simply a centralized SCAM. RIPPLE XRP is SCREWED! Whye Ethereum is reprimanded by SEC it will come much worse for XRP: Ripple will be forgotten and replaced by new coins! Ripple had always a huge exposure because it was highly ranked at Coinmarketcap and people bought it directly after BTC and ETH. Ripple fraud marketing by bot advertising to deceive people worked very well until it was EXPOSED. But now it is inevitable for Ripple to lose more importance every day! New, decentralized and fast coins are rising and Ripple will be losing positions over time. It will be embarassing to watch for alle Rippletards, so better get out ASAP! For everyone still holding XRP: Better get out ASAP. XRP is a scam coin and will go down like a sinking ship! Maybe con man Garlingcrook will get arrested and his money will be spent for human rights or to help Ukraine.  It would be nice.

comments.author: Elena_Rodriguez
comments.body: Ripple is facing huge whale movements ahead of their decision on Ripple vs SEC. According to the data furnished by the crypto whale monitoring carrier, the most current transaction came about on December 12 – a withdrawal of 38,893,182 (38.89M) XRP worth $14.4M by an unnamed whale. XRP whales have flipped huge amounts of cryptocurrency for the reason that information unfold. It is no joke that if Ripple were to lose its case against the SEC, it would seriously cripple the whole sector. The previous ripple price prediction by coinpedia stated it may hover among $0.7 to $0.95 by the give up of the year 2022 but it looks this may not be the case for XRP prices now. As the decision attracts closer,  we can anticipate a direct effect on the XRP prices.News source - https://coinpedia.org/price-prediction/xrp-ripple-price-prediction/We have to wait and watch untill we declare Ripple XRP as a failed coin.

Being centralized is not a "scam" it's just being centralized. Being a scam needs a proof. How were you betrayed? Did someone promise you money or did someone steal your money? Maybe start by what do you mean by fraud bot marketing.Right now you sound like someone who was heavily invested to Ripple for a long time and got angry because that rocket never took off. Most people were very aware and very vocal about the fact that those fundamentals wouldn't justify such a high marketcap and saw it didn't have room to grow.Then there are ripple investors:

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: https://cointelegraph.com/news/is-ripple-poised-to-settle-with-sec-this-week-crypto-twitter-weighs-inMeanwhile, crypto attorney Jeremy Hogan, a partner at Hogan & Hogan, says there are several possible outcomes. In a Dec. 10 YouTube video, Hogan told his 157,000 subscribers that he thought there was roughly a 50% chance that Ripple wins, but a “110.6% chance of something happening shortly.”The lawyer predicted that if Ripple wins, the most likely reason would be “it had no legal obligation to purchasers of XRP after the sale occurred, no post sale obligations, in other words there can be no investment contract without an investment contract.”“The evidence is clear in the Ripple case that there is no ongoing legal relationship between Ripple and XRP purchasers. There’s just none, and the SEC has failed to address that problem,” he added.However, he also backed an earlier Nov. 4 prediction by defense lawyer and former federal prosecutor James Filan that the case will be decided on or before March 31, 2023, calling it a “proclamation from a legal God.”
